EmailTemplate.description: Email template for work order completion email subscriptions.
EmailTemplate.name: Work Order Completed Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Completed Work Order for Dealer Id {!Email_Notification__c.Dealership_Id__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account: {!Email_Notification__c.Account_Name__c} has recently completed a Work Order. Work Order Number: {!Email_Notification__c.Work_Order_Number__c}. The Dealer Id for the account is: {!Email_Notification__c.Dealership_Id__c}. Link to Account The VINs related to this work order are: {!Email_Notification__c.Work_Order_VINs__c} Please follow up with any necessary actions.
Thank You!
640 Ellicott St #321 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe.
